The selected script '''' has been specifically marked to not run on this installation. It should only be run on an installation of type '' but your installation has been configured as type ''. Usually scripts are marked this way to prevent duplicate actions (eg sending email or procesing purchases).
Do you still want to run this script anyway?

The 'log until' date cannot be in the past.

Geachte heer/mevrouw,
deze server zal (over XX minuten / vandaag om XX:XX / op XX-XX-XXX om XX:XX) worden geüpdatet. Hiervoor wordt u automatisch uitgelogd.
Sluit a.u.b. je openstaande applicaties. Niet-opgeslagen gegevens kunnen verloren gaan.
Het onderhoud zal ongeveer XX minuten in beslag nemen. Na deze periode kun je weer inloggen.
Onze excuses voor het ongemak.
--
Dear sir / madam,
This server will be updated (in XX minutes / today at XX:XX AM/PM / XX-XX-XXXX at XX-XX AM-PM). You will be automatically logged out.
Please close any running applications. Unsaved data could be lost.
The maintenance will take approximately XX minutes. After this period you can log in again.
We apologize for any inconvenience.

This server will be updated on at . You will be logged out. Please close all applications to avoid loss of data. The maintenance will take approximately minutes.

The hostname '' was already on the alias list for this webserver.The new hostname will be set for this webserver as its preferred hostname, and the old hostname '' will be moved to the alias list instead.

The selected port does not have encryption set up, so the URL must start with 'http://'.
The selected port has been configured to use encryption, so the URL must start with 'https://'.
The hostname '' is already in use by a different virtual hosted webserver.
The hostname '' is already in use by an alias of the virtual hosted webserver' '.
The URL of a hosted webserver may not contain a subpath, it must be of the form 'http(s)://hostname/'.

Select 'connect' to reauthenticate yourself to the server.

The current branch of this module is not present on the origin. This may happen if you are working on a feature branch. Please commit and push first. Are you sure you want to proceed deploying this module?

Are you sure you want to replace it?

The module on the server is from a different repository (local: '', server: '').
Are you sure you want to replace it?
The module '' on the server has version '' which does not satisfy the requested version ''
The required module '' is not present on the server.

The module on the server has been modified after installation.
Are you sure you want to replace it?

The HEAD of your git working copy is not at the branch head - you either have local changes you did not push to the origin server, or the origin server has changes you haven't pulled to your local copy yet.
Please merge or rebase, and then push the changes to origin. Are you sure you want to proceed?

A newer version of this module is available in the central repository. Please update your local module first.
Are you sure you want to deploy this (outdated) version?
Module has been modified after installation
This module has uncommitted changes. Are you sure you want to deploy this module?

The local git repository contains commits that haven't yet been pushed to the central repository. Please push these changes first.
Are you sure you want to proceed with deploying this module?
This module does not exist on the server yet. Are you sure you want to deploy this module?
